description:
Jamie turned 18 a few months ago. He's not very experienced sexually and he's very, very shy.
A photographer sent us his pictures and I liked what I saw, so we had him come in. Fresh out of high school, he was interested in making some extra money and showing off for the camera.
Normally I like to chat with a prospective model for a while in order to make them feel comfortable. Jamie is pretty reticent though and as we got into the swing of things it seemed like he wasn't quite sure to make of the whole thing.
I figured that he would have an easier time of it if I paired him up with someone who had a little experience — someone who could take charge and make him relax. Well, we just happened to be working with Cameron that day. Cameron thought Jamie was a total hottie and loved the idea of stripping him down and giving him a nice, long blow job...
title: Blowing Jamie
